title: Who needs to be a douchbag or toxic when you have dunkmaster DARIUS.
body: The best toxic skin ever made ,it actually makes top laners rage and talk crap when I press ctrl+2 thank you Rito for the best skin ever made now no one can't get reported for using his taunts!!! I love this skin I like how people get mad over the " you might wanna get a dayjob taunt."
